title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-4.4 - Fee: review of maps
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 270-4.4 - Fee: review of maps

State Regulations
A certified check in the amount of $500 made payable to
the New York State Commissioner of General Services shall accompany any notices
of intention referred to in section
270-4.2
of this Subpart. Such check
will be used to defray the cost of reviewing the survey map(s), title and
description(s). A refund may be made in the event the application is
withdrawn. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
270-4.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
